About me

Hey! My name's Luke and I'm a junior studying Computer Science Games with a minor in Screenwriting at the University of Southern California.

I specialize in Gameplay Programming, and am also passionate about Game Design and Narrative Design. I have experience collaborating with other disciplines in game projects with large teams and have written industry-level code with proper documentation and code commenting that follows given style guides.

I have experience working on USC Advanced Game Projects, as well as working as a gameplay programmer for Rat Economy (a student-formed game studio at USC) and a programming/design internship at OmniMegaSuperCorp.
